text: Yin Chengzong (Chinese: 殷承宗, Pinyin: Yīn Chéngzōng) (born 1941 in Gulangyu Island, Xiamen, Fujian, China) is a Chinese pianist and composer. He is famous for composing the Yellow River Piano Concerto he arranged based on the Yellow River Cantata. == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese pianists Category:Chinese composers Category:People from Fujian
title: Yin Chengzong
